title: Potato bread (Kartoffelbrot)
description: This is a deliciously moist, soft bread, which is perfect with white asparagus soup. It really is a multi-purpose bread and great for sandwiches or fried.
ingredients: 375g/13oz potatoes (preferably Maris Piper), peeled and cut into even chunks (300g/10½oz peeled weight)
1 tbsp sunflower oil, plus extra for greasing
300g/10½oz strong white flour, plus extra for kneading
(or 100g/3½oz strong wholemeal flour and 200g/7oz strong white flour)
